sentence.Network_en: The reactionary officials took bribes insatiably, giving not the least care to the future of the nation.
sentence.Network_cn: 反动官僚贪贿无艺,根本不把国家前途放在心上.

sentence.Network_en: The trucks were still filing past, the people still insatiably gaping.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡车依然过个没完, 人们依然贪婪地傻看.

sentence.Network_en: He clawed insatiably at the traditional precepts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他永不自足地死守传统规矩.

insatiability 不饱症, insatiably 贪得无厌地, insatiable 不饱的

list.abs: He was dominated by an insatiable drive for fame ., 他被一种难以满足的成名驱力支配著.

insatiable是什么意思... ... Insatiable Consumer ： 贪得无厌消费者 be insatiable ： 得陇望蜀 The Insatiable ： 永不满足.
in bed , you two have nearly insatiable appetites , which is good , for you will enjoy one another hilt .在床上，两个人有差不多贪婪的胃口，这是好的，因为你们将充分喜爱彼此。
fed the god of war insatiable ., 满足神对战争的渴望.

means.word_mean: 2. in an insatiable manner; with persistence but without satisfaction;
